characters.name: 小马喽
characters.appearance: Chibi style, a cute baby monkey character, large expressive amber eyes, golden-brown fluffy fur, wearing a small tiger-skin loincloth and a red silk scarf. Round face, mischievous smile. Proportions: 2-head tall. Holding a small wooden staff.

characters.name: 土地公公
characters.appearance: Chibi old deity, very short, long white flowing beard reaching the ground, wearing a green leaf robe, holding a wooden staff with a glowing peach attached. Kind face, squinting eyes.

characters.name: 嫦娥姐姐
characters.appearance: Beautiful Q-version goddess, floating in the air, wearing elegant white and purple flowing hanfu, long black hair with jade ornaments, holding a chubby white rabbit. Soft glowing aura.

characters.name: 猪八戒 (休假中)
characters.appearance: Cute chubby pig man, wearing a loose black monk robe, lying on a large watermelon, holding a wooden rake as a back-scratcher. Relaxed and sleepy expression.

characters.name: 巡山小钻风
characters.appearance: Tiny demon scout, wearing an oversized helmet covering eyes, carrying a red flag on his back, holding a small gong. Clumsy movements.

characters.name: 奔波儿灞
characters.appearance: Chibi fish-man, big bulging eyes, blue scales, wearing simple seaweed armor, holding a bubble wand (trident).

characters.name: 蜘蛛精妹妹
characters.appearance: Cute spider girl, 4 extra fuzzy spider legs on her back, purple gothic lolita style dress, large purple eyes, mischievous grin.
